Summary: Bright white light across horizon heading at us up to mountain and out into space.
divs: sighting detailsbright white light was coming across the horizon heading at us. my son said dad look at the plane and i responded the plane\jet is this way over to the west. i looked to the south where he was looking to see the bright oval light. it came towards us up to the ne and over the local mtns towards the fish hatchery and then went straight up into the air until the massive light went dim out past the stars adn disappeared in a matter of only a few seconds or less.
